statements: SELECT * FROM PesticideFertilizerUsage;
SELECT id, pesticide_name, pesticide_application_rate FROM PesticideFertilizerUsage;
SELECT * FROM PesticideFertilizerUsage WHERE id = 1;
SELECT pesticide_name, fertilizer_name FROM PesticideFertilizerUsage WHERE pesticide_application_rate > 2.5;
SELECT MAX(pesticide_application_rate) AS max_pesticide_rate FROM PesticideFertilizerUsage;
SELECT id, pesticide_name, pesticide_application_rate, fertilizer_name, fertilizer_application_rate FROM PesticideFertilizerUsage;
SELECT pesticide_name, fertilizer_name FROM PesticideFertilizerUsage WHERE pesticide_application_rate > 2.5;
SELECT * FROM PesticideFertilizerUsage WHERE fertilizer_name LIKE 'ammonium%';
SELECT id, pesticide_name AS 'Pesticide Name', fertilizer_name AS 'Fertilizer Name' FROM PesticideFertilizerUsage ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT AVG(pesticide_application_rate) AS 'Avg Pesticide Rate', AVG(fertilizer_application_rate) AS 'Avg Fertilizer Rate' FROM PesticideFertilizerUsage;
SELECT * FROM Pesticides WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Chemicals';
SELECT name, application_rate FROM Fertilizers WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, name FROM Pesticides WHERE application_rate > 2.5;
SELECT name, manufacturer FROM Pesticides WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Fertilizers WHERE npk_ratio LIKE '%10%';
SELECT id, name, application_rate, manufacturer FROM Pesticides WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, application_rate, manufacturer FROM Pesticides WHERE manufacturer LIKE '%Company%' ORDER BY application_rate DESC
SELECT name, npk_ratio FROM Fertilizers WHERE npk_ratio LIKE '10-10-10%' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name, application_rate FROM Pesticides WHERE application_rate BETWEEN 5.0 AND 10.0 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM Fertilizers JOIN Pesticides ON Fertilizers.id = Pesticides.id
SELECT * FROM Pesticides;
SELECT p_name, application_rate FROM Pesticides WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT f_name, composition FROM Fertilizers WHERE application_rate > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM Application_Log ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, product_id, quantity_applied FROM Application_Log WHERE user_id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM Pesticides;
SELECT p_name, manufacturer FROM Pesticides WHERE application_rate > 0.5;
SELECT f_name, composition, expiry_date FROM Fertilizers WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT p_name, application_rate, manufacturer FROM Pesticides WHERE expiry_date < '2023-06-30' ORDER BY application_rate DESC;
SELECT log_id, product_id, quantity_applied, application_date, application_method FROM Application_Log WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM pesticide_usage;
SELECT product_name, application_rate FROM fertilizer_usage WHERE nutrient_type='Nitrogen';
SELECT MAX(application_rate) FROM pesticide_usage;
SELECT id, application_date, target_crop FROM fertilizer_usage WHERE application_rate > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_type FROM field_area ORDER BY crop_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM pesticide_usage ORDER BY application_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, application_rate FROM fertilizer_usage WHERE nutrient_type='Nitrogen' AND target_crop='Corn';
SELECT field_name, crop_type, soil_type FROM field_area WHERE area_acres > 10 ORDER BY field_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_pesticide='Herbicide' OR preferred_nutrient='Phosphorus';
SELECT id, product_name, application_rate FROM pesticide_usage WHERE pesticide_type='Insecticide';
SELECT * FROM pesticides LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, type FROM fertilizers WHERE manufacturer='ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM applications WHERE date >= '2022-08-01' ORDER BY area_applied DESC;
SELECT id, event, timestamp FROM logs WHERE event LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM pesticides GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT id, name, type, application_rate FROM pesticides WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Chemicals';
SELECT name, type, application_rate, manufacturer FROM pesticides WHERE type = 'Insecticide';
SELECT * FROM applications WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, name, npk_ratio, application_rate, manufacturer FROM fertilizers WHERE type = 'Organic';
SELECT timestamp, event, detail FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
